items.title: Quick Notes Widget
items.description: A built-in notepad for quick thoughts that stays right on your new tab page

items.title: Habit Tracker
items.description: Track your daily habits with customizable goals, streaks, and progress visualizations.

items.title: Joke of the Day
items.description: Get a new joke every day. The punchline is hidden until you click the joke.

items.title: Random Fun Fact
items.description: A daily interesting fact to spark curiosity.

items.title: Mindfulness Reminder
items.description: Short breathing exercises or stress relief tips.

items.title: Virtual Pet
items.description: A Tamagotchi-style pet that reacts to your productivity.

items.title: Custom Avatar Maker
items.description: A fun tool to create a pixel art or cartoon avatar.

items.title: Daily Challenge
items.description: A small challenge (e.g., "Send a nice message to someone").

items.title: Mini Magic 8-Ball
items.description: Ask a question and get a fun answer.

items.title: Weather Widget
items.description: A weather widget that shows the current weather and forecast.

items.title: Quick Icons and Links
items.description: A quick icons and links widget that allows you to add, edit, and delete icons and links.

items.title: Confetti Effect
items.description: A confetti effect that appears when you complete all tasks on your to-do list and when you complete all daily habits.

items.title: To-Do List
items.description: A to-do list that allows you to add, edit, and delete tasks.

items.title: Google Search Removed
items.description: Google search is no longer available in the new tab page.

items.title: Calculator Widget
items.description: A calculator widget that allows you to calculate basic math operations.

items.title: Quote of the Day
items.description: A quote of the day widget that shows a new quote every day.

items.title: Themes
items.description: A themes widget that allows you to change the theme of the new tab page.

items.title: Movable Links
items.description: A movable links function in settings that allows you to move the links around the new tab page.
